title: Learn how to invest in the stock market with Tykr, now $20 off with code
content:
Macworld

The stock market can be intimidating. And if you start trading without knowing the risks, you could quickly lose everything. Want to become a better investor? Then first get the Tykr Stock Screener — And now is a great time since you can save $20 off the regular price with code during our Memorial Day Sale.

Tykr is a market education and stock analysis tool that identifies the risk factor for 30,000 US and international stocks. It illustrates the basics of making a trade, teaches you how to identify good deals, and it makes calculations openly so you’ll see exactly how it works.

If you’re investing, then it’s a resource that’s worth having in your corner. And since it presents information in a beginner-friendly way, virtually anyone can make sense of it — Which is why it’s earned 4.9 out of 5-star ratings by users on both Trustpilot and AppSumo.

While nothing can completely eliminate the risk, the Tykr Stock Screener does a great job of educating investors so they’ll be better prepared to make smart trades. And since a lifetime subscription to their Pro Plan — normally $119.99 — is on sale for $20 off with code “STOCK” until 11:59 pm on May 28, it’s even easier to afford.

 

Tykr Stock Screener: Pro Plan Lifetime Subscription – $119.99
